rows.label: qst202707_msg0001
rows.name:
Friends!
What news?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0002
rows.name: Well, we've done some asking around.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0003
rows.name:
The cult meets on some rooftop
at night, performing a ritual called
the Purpure Altar.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0004
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh...

rows.label: qst202707_msg0005
rows.name:
They form a circle, lie down,
then chant some kind of spell.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0007
rows.name:
Anybody else think they sound like
a mega relaxed bunch? No? Just me?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0008
rows.name:
Sound like mega dangerous bunch,
meh!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0009
rows.name:
Most Nopon not into religion stuff!
So for littlepon to chant spells is
perversion of natural order!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0010
rows.name: Is that right?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0011
rows.name: Friends, Mamumu beg you!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0012
rows.name:
If daughterpon involved with lunatics,
please convince her to come back!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0013
rows.name: She not listen to what Mamumu say...

rows.label: qst202707_msg0014
rows.name:
But if words come from you friends,
she maybe more open-minded!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0015
rows.name:
Understood.
We'll see what we can do.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0016
rows.name:
Really?!
Thanks to friends, oh, thanks!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0017
rows.name: You'll come too, won't you, Mei?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0018
rows.name:
...All right, sure. Beating up a hoodlum
girl to make her change her ways was
on my bucket list anyway.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0019
rows.name: ...I think we'll try talking first.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0020
rows.name:
Yeah, yeah...
What's the kid's name, then?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0021
rows.name: Name is Mimumu!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0022
rows.name:
Great!
We'll have Mimumu saved by lunchtime!
